arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Luis Enrique doesn’t mince his words: journalists, method, Zabarnyi and the group
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain won 0-1 against Nantes this Sunday at the Stade de la Beaujoire in Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. After the match, Parisian coach Luis Enrique spoke to Ligue 1+. Luis Enrique: “They’re always concerned about physical capacity and mental capacity.” How were you physically? I think this is an area […]

arts.ttl: “A very good game” – Luis Enrique gives verdict on Illia Zabarnyi’s PSG debut against Nantes
arts.sum: PSG head coach Luis Enrique was pleased with Illia Zabarnyi’s (22) debut with Les Parisiens. The Ukrainian defender has been given the nod for the first time by the Spaniard…

arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Zabarnyi savors it fully and sets the tone
arts.sum: Ilya Zabarnyi, 22-year-old Paris Saint-Germain defender, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 0-1 victory over Nantes this Sunday at the Stade de la Beaujoire as part of Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. He reflected on his debut and looked ahead to this season in Paris. Zabarnyi: “I love playing matches with a […]

arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Victory, preparation and the World Cup, Hernandez’s strong words
arts.sum: Lucas Hernandez, 29-year-old Paris Saint-Germain defender, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 0-1 victory against Nantes this Sunday at the Stade de la Beaujoire as part of Matchday 1 of Ligue 1 2025-2026. Hernandez: “It’s only the beginning.” Are you relieved after this first victory? It’s true that it’s not easy. We’ve had a very […]

arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Vitinha bluntly says “this match was difficult to play”
arts.sum: Vitinha, 25-year-old Paris Saint-Germain midfielder, spoke to Ligue 1+ after the 0-1 victory against Nantes this Sunday at the Stade de la Beaujoire in Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. He spoke of the positives that came from this “difficult” victory, as there is still physical work to be done. Vitinha: “We’re preparing.” […]

arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Parisians’ ratings: Vitinha regulates and delivers Paris
arts.sum: This Sunday, on Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season, Paris Saint-Germain faced Nantes at the Stade de la Beaujoire. After a match in which the Red and Blue largely dominated, they won 0-1. Here are our ratings for the Parisians. Goalkeeper – Lucas Chevalier (6) – An uneventful first half. He really didn’t […]

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Nantes 0-1 PSG: Ligue 1 champions claim opening day win
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Matchday 1, 17/08/25 PSG got their Ligue 1 title defense underway with a sluggish 1-0 away win at Nantes. The Champions League winners claimed all three points…

arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Is this the right time to face Paris? Coquelin has a clear answer
arts.sum: This Sunday at 8:45 p.m. (broadcast on Ligue1+), Paris Saint-Germain will face Nantes at the Stade de la Beaujoire for the opening match of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – “If necessary, we will die,” Luis Castro welcomes Paris with strong words
arts.sum: This Sunday at 8:45 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain will face Nantes at the Stade de la Beaujoire as part of Matchday 1 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. arts.ttl: Nantes vs PSG – Luis Enrique shows Paris’s ambitions!
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain coach Luis Enrique held a press conference this Saturday ahead of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 match against Nantes at the Stade de la Beaujoire tomorrow (kick-off at 8:45 p.m., CET).
